Package com.example.app.service.impl

Class ManagerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
com.example.app.service.impl.ManagerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ManagerService, UserService
public class ManagerServiceImpl extends UserServiceImpl implements ManagerService
Service implementation for manager service The ManagerServiceImpl possesses methods from the UserServiceImpl and implements the ManagerService interface.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(Manager manager, String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, boolean visibility, Integer officerLimit, Set<Integer> officers, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException, IllegalStateException
      Allow a manager to create a new project. The project is created only if the project dates do not overlap with existing projects.
      Specified by:
      createProject in interface ManagerService
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager creating the project
      projectName - the name of the project
      applicationOpenDate - the date when applications open
      applicationCloseDate - the date when applications close
      neighborhood - the neighborhood of the project
      visibility - the visibility of the project
      officerLimit - the limit on the number of officers
      officers - the set of officer IDs
      groups - the set of marital status groups
      flats - the map of flat types and their quantities
      Returns:
      the created project
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the project dates overlap with existing projects

    • updateProject

      public Project updateProject(Manager manager, int projectId, String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, boolean visibility, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException, IllegalStateException
      Allow a manager to update an existing project. Cannot edit the project after the application end date.
      Specified by:
      updateProject in interface ManagerService
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager updating the project
      projectId - the ID of the project
      projectName - the name of the project
      applicationOpenDate - the date when applications open
      applicationCloseDate - the date when applications close
      neighborhood - the neighborhood of the project
      visibility - the visibility of the project
      groups - the set of marital status groups
      flats - the map of flat types and their quantities
      Returns:
      the updated project
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException

    • updateWithdrawalStatus

      public Application updateWithdrawalStatus(int applicationId, boolean success) throws IOException
      Update the withdrawal status of an application. The application will be set to WITHDRAWN if the success parameter is true In either case of status, the request for withdrawal will still be marked as processed and hence, set back to false
      Specified by:
      updateWithdrawalStatus in interface ManagerService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - the ID of the application
      success - the new withdrawal status
      Returns:
      the update application object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • getBookedApplicationsReport

      public List<ApplicantBookingReportRow> getBookedApplicationsReport(MaritalStatus maritalStatus, FlatType flatType, String projectName, Integer minAge, Integer maxAge) throws IOException
      Get a report of booked applications based on various filters.
      Specified by:
      getBookedApplicationsReport in interface ManagerService
      Parameters:
      maritalStatus - the marital status to filter by (can be null)
      flatType - the flat type to filter by (can be null)
      projectName - the project name to filter by (can be null)
      minAge - the minimum age to filter by (can be null)
      maxAge - the maximum age to filter by (can be null)
      Returns:
      a list of booked applications matching the filters
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
